casebody.data:
MARINELLI, Respondent, v. FERRAND, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

Additional General Term.

December 16, 1895.) Action by Louis Marinelli against Nelson A. Ferrand. Cromwell G. Macy, for appellant. Turk J. Roth, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment reversed? new trial' ordered; costs to appellant to abide event.
